body:
Never seen this before. I was working on #1156 and came across this:

```
$ spack uninstall -ad libatomic-ops
==> The following packages will be uninstalled : 

-- linux-centos6-x86_64 / gcc@6.1.0 -----------------------------
dacl7r2 bdw-gc@7.4.4%gcc+libatomic-ops

yoygogc gc@7.4.4%gcc+libatomic-ops

tzxvrb6 guile@2.0.11%gcc+readline

5l2ibjb libatomic-ops@7.4.4%gcc

2xusyxk libctl@3.2.2%gcc


==> Do you want to proceed ? [y/n]
y
==> Error: Package Package has no version with a URL.
```
title: Package Package has no version with a URL
